summary: Snipsync comments (// @@@SNIP{START,END}) are incorrectly appearing in generated code when creating a new package via npm init @temporalio. These comments should be stripped away during code generation.
userImpact: Users see unwanted snipsync comments in their generated project code, creating confusion and clutter.
rootCause: Code generation template processor is not removing snipsync comment markers
keyQuote: // @@@SNIP{START,END} comment show up in generated code.
